Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 79th buses temp. rerouted  WB: 79th, Stony Island, S Chicago, 76th, Cottge Grv, and 79th; EB: 79th, Cottge Grv, 76th, S Chicago and 79th at 79th/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Cottage Grove due to street blockage.

Westbound buses will operate via 79th, Stony Island, South Chicago, 76th, Cottage Grove, and 79th.

Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, Cottage Grove, 76th, South Chicago, and 79th.

Allow extra travel time.
